name: Garden Genesis: The Art of Cultivation
name_original: Garden Genesis: The Art of Cultivation
description:
Welcome to our root game. In this game, you will be opening your own flower shop and using your botany skill to reproduce and mix plants.  Sell your creations to save up for a happy retirement. 


Credits:

Programmers:
Alex Woods 
Caleb Brazeau

Artists:
